get.desc: Lists all of the protection policies within a resource group.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.desc: Create or update policy with specified rule set name within a resource group.

201.desc: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new protection policy has been created.

202.desc: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
